patterns: How to make herb-crusted pork chops?
responses:
Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a small bowl, mix together the chopped thyme, rosemary, oregano, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Pat the pork chops dry with paper towels and season them with the herb mixture on both sides.
